===================
Ingeniweb cfg files
===================

To be able to run Plone, you need to install PIL.

Under Linux or Mac OS X::

    $ easy_install http://release.ingeniweb.com/third-party-dist/PILwoTk-1.1.6.4.tar.gz

Under Windows:

1. Get http://release.ingeniweb.com/third-party-dist/python2.4.4-win32.zip

2. run it
